entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
